name_for_human: Usama Javed - Full Stack Developer Perth
description_for_model: Portfolio and professional services of Usama Javed, an expert Full Stack Developer based in Perth, Western Australia. Specializes in Next.js, React, Node.js, TypeScript, AI integrations, N8N automation, NetSuite, ERP systems, and enterprise solutions. Available for hire for web development, software engineering, and digital transformation projects in Perth and across Australia.
